description:
Trying to hold on to `your` slippers is harder than it seems.
With friends like these, who needs enemies?
When mom gives you weird nicknames, you just have to go with it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onsen Slipper / Yoshioka, Sakana Kirai / Yuzu no Yobikata
The Hot Spring Slippers / Yoshioka Hates Fish / Yuzu`s Nicknames
温泉スリッパ / 吉岡, 魚きらい / ユズの呼びかた
